## Improving the user journey for VAT reclaims

Shop whilst travelling 
With Revenir, there’s no need to wait in line or fill out complex forms at airports. Receive your VAT refund directly to your account, hassle-free. Simply follow the instructions provided through your banking application, uploading the relevant documents on eligible transactions. 
Snap your VAT receipts 
Take a picture of your approved VAT invoice and upload it to your banking application. 
Scan barcode 
We will supply a VAT reclaim barcode to you through your application, which you can scan at an automated kiosk at your departure terminal, after passport control. 
Claim VAT refund 
We typically refund within 48 hours of your barcode being scanned, with no need for long wait times. 
## Our Technology
At Revenir, we leverage advanced technologies including machine learning, optical recognition, and proprietary algorithms to simplify the VAT reclaim process for travelers. Our platform identifies eligible purchases automatically, ensuring that you receive the VAT refunds you’re entitled to without the usual hassle.
Through strategic partnerships and agreements with local tax authorities, Revenir facilitates seamless processing and swift delivery of VAT refunds directly to your account. Experience the future of VAT reclaim with Revenir – efficient, reliable, and designed to maximize your savings.
###  AI and Machine Learning 
Revenir securely leverages the latest AI technology to interpret forms, receipts and data to streamline our services for our customers. 
###  Pattern Matching 
Revenir are a technology company adept at pattern matching, integrating technology through a unique AWS architecture. 
###  API integration 
At our heart we are a technology company adept at integrating a well considered API service, linking tax authorities to customers directly through their card providers. 
## Sustainability
![](https://www.revenir.ai/)
At Revenir, sustainability is at the core of what we do. By eliminating the reliance on paper forms and transitioning away from paper receipts, we reduce environmental impact significantly. Additionally, we are proud to partner with Ecologi to plant a tree for every 10 VAT reclaims processed, contributing to global reforestation efforts.Our commitment extends to our technology infrastructure as well. Revenir utilizes sustainable AWS hosting solutions, which include energy-efficient data centers powered by renewable energy sources. This ensures that our operations minimize carbon footprint while maintaining reliability and security.Furthermore, our website is designed to be environmentally responsible, achieving a Website Carbon score of A+. We are dedicated to continuous improvement in sustainability practices, aiming to lead by example in the financial technology industry.Join us in making a positive impact on the environment with Revenir – where sustainability meets innovation.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Revenir**

**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** London, United Kingdom  
**Team Size:** 11 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator W20  
**Website:** [revenir.ai](https://www.revenir.ai)  
**Focus Areas:** Fintech, SaaS, Travel  

**Mission:**  
Revenir aims to be the first API solution for tax returns, simplifying the VAT refund process for individuals and corporations globally.

---

**The Story Behind Revenir:**

Revenir began with a simple yet powerful idea: "Your free money back to you with the trust of your own bank." This vision drives their mission to help people reclaim the value-added tax (VAT) on purchases made abroad. It's astonishing how much VAT goes unclaimed—around 80%—and Revenir is here to change that.

**How They Do It:**

By automating tax recovery processes through partnerships with banks, Revenir eliminates the cumbersome, paperwork-heavy process typically associated with VAT refunds. Instead, customers simply upload a picture of their receipts through their banking app, and Revenir takes care of the rest. You'll receive your VAT reclaim back in your account—often within just 48 hours—without having to queue at an airport or fill out confusing forms.

**Who They Work With:**

Revenir collaborates with various financial institutions, allowing them to offer these VAT reclaim services to their customers seamlessly. Their white-label solutions empower banks and card providers to integrate this functionality via APIs, enhancing customer experience and potentially generating additional revenue streams.

**Cutting-Edge Technology:**

At the heart of Revenir’s platform are advanced technologies like machine learning and optical recognition. These help automatically identify eligible purchases, streamline the claim process, and ensure users never miss out on what they're owed. Revenir’s architecture utilizes AWS for robust and sustainable operations, reflecting their commitment to both innovation and environmental responsibility.

**Sustainability Efforts:**

Revenir takes sustainability seriously. They’ve reduced paper waste by eliminating reliance on physical receipts and forms. In partnership with Ecologi, they plant a tree for every ten VAT reclaims processed, contributing to global reforestation efforts. Their operations are powered by renewable energy sources, further reducing their carbon footprint.

**The Revenir Advantage:**

With Revenir, you can say goodbye to the headaches of traditional VAT reclaim processes. No waiting in long lines or enduring confusing forms. Just easy, integrated solutions that let you focus on enjoying your travels, all while ensuring you get the VAT refunds you deserve.

In a nutshell, Revenir isn’t just about reclaiming taxes; it’s about transforming the user experience through technology and sustainability. If you’re someone who frequently travels and shops internationally, you might want to keep an eye on this innovative player in the fintech space.
